title: Prior Authorization Spiral
personaSummary: Approval workflows delay care and shift burden to families.
narrationSteps: Care starts with unmet needs and tight timelines.
Costs rise and financial pressure increases.
Policy steps add more delay and paperwork.
Delays return as higher burden on the person.

title: Community Trust Repair
personaSummary: Community support lowers barriers and improves service fit.
narrationSteps: Caregivers seek trusted support outside clinics.
Trust grows and social barriers drop.
Lower barriers reduce burden for the person.
Services become easier to use and trust.
